content: CFS-MSL GPR Retrofit Gangplate Surface-mounted gangplates for installing modular fire sleeves after drywall ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Accessories for firestop & fire protection- - - ### FEATURES:Features Includes ready-to-install smoke gasket – no additional products required Modular design for easy customization – you can combine fire-rated sleeves in different sizes within one frame Retrofittable design for easy installation in existing cable openings Can be stacked in rows or columns Applications Surface-mounted use on drywall, concrete and masonry CFS-MSL GCL Clamps are required for ganging ### TECHNICAL DATA: Product Class: Ultimate Application temperature range: 23 - 122 °F Storage and transportation temperature range: 23 - 122 °F Technical Data | Product Class | Ultimate | Application temperature range | 23 - 122 °F | Storage and transportation temperature range | 23 - 122 °F | Temperature resistance range | -22 - 167 °F ### ITEMS- 2341227 - Retrofit gang plate CFS-MSL GPR 9x4 - Package Size 1 pc - 2341228 - Retrofit gang plate CFS-MSL GPR 12x4 - Package Size 1 pc - 3805995 - Retrofit gang plate 12x4 & 2xLarge device + 1Ganging clamps 4pcs - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x CFS-MSL GPR 12x4 Retrofit gang plate - 2x CFS-MSL L 6x4 Firestop sleeve - 12x CFS-MSL GCL (12) Ganging clip
